headline.main: $10,000 to Combat Lindbergh Is Sought From Movie Unit of Friends of Democracy

lead_paragraph: While girls outside in vivid scarlet costumes proclaimed loudly that every one who crossed their picket line must have Fascist and anti-Semitic sympathies fifty members of the motion picture division of Friends of Democracy lunching at Shor's restaurant, 51 West Fifty-first Street, were asked by this organization's national director, Dr. L. M. Birkhead, to contribute $10,000 for a publicity campaign branding Charles A. Lindbergh as a Nazi.
abstract: Friends of Democracy seek funds for campaign to brand Lindbergh as Nazi
